New Records: West Indies registered 51 dot balls, the most by any team in a T20 World Cup match while scoring 180 or more
Key Match Events: Phil Salt scored an unbeaten 87, Jonny Bairstow scored an unbeaten 48 as England chased down West Indies' total of 180 with 15 balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: England's victory sets a marker for the rest of the teams in the Super Eight of the T20 World Cup 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a fine batting deck at the Daren Sammy National Stadium
Others: Adil Rashid was the pick of the bowlers with 1 for 21 from his four overs, while Jofra Archer took the wicket of Andre Russell
